content.description:
An algorithm is intended to display the following output.

red red blue red red blue red red blue
content.question: Which of the following code segments can be used to display the intended output?

choices.label: The figure presents one block of code that consists of 4 total lines. Throughout the block of code there are nested blocks of code. [Begin Block] Line 1: REPEAT 2 TIMES [Begin Block] [Begin Block] Line 2: REPEAT 3 TIMES [Begin Block] Line 3: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] “red” [end block] [end block]  [End Block] [End Block] Line 4: [begin block] DISPLAY [begin block] “blue” [end block] [end block] [End Block] [End Block]

content.answer: The figure presents one block of code that consists of 4 total lines. Throughout the block of code there are nested blocks of code.
